channel.title: Data conversion pricing
channel.description:
For my software something that people often ask for, and is important for getting new users on board, is data conversion from their old software. Currently I do this for free, but as it often takes 2-4 hours I am considering charging, something along the $200 mark.
However, I don't want this cost to be a barrier to entry so what do you think are the best options.
- Only pay if they sign up for a subscription - Buy a 12 month subscription and get data conversion free - Spread the cost over the first 12 months - Something else
Thanks Craig

item.title: Data conversion pricing
item.dc:creator: tnorthcutt
item.description:
I like the strategy of having a highest priced tier that includes free migration/conversion. You could also do that on any annual plan, but I would consider offering it only on higher priced ones. Of course, I don’t know the details of your pricing currently.

Read full topic
